data.text: @khalidkarim If we do this, BA2 will follow. We can’t cope & we don’t have resources

@khalidkarim 2 Feb - The WHO warned that the next Covid variant will be even more contagious than omicron. The WHO declares a disease a pandemic when its growth is exponential and it is spreading globally. https://t.co/1QX3XuvxEt
@khalidkarim Send all those with comorbidities and old to to grave.

~No need to self-isolate even when positive.
~No need to test if close contact.
~No more MySejahtera
~Can go Zouk again.
